title: Mackerel
full_text:
Mackerel
"The Mackerel is a Foralkan interceptor."
The Mackerel is a T1 interceptor-class ship of the Foralkan ship line. It is best suited as a fast but heavy-hitting interceptor.
Advantages
The Mackerel's two engine slots grants high maneuverability, and it is one of the most agile fighters once fully fitted. Pilots can fly circles around targets while dealing bursts of damage with properly fitted weapon rigs.
Disadvantages
The Mackerel is an T1 faction interceptor, and thus will perform poorly against its upgraded counterparts. In addition, a low hull pool causes it to be vulnerable to weapons with good tracking. It has less offensive capabilities compared to other Foralkan ships as a tradeoff for its agility.
As a faction ship, its blueprint must be purchased using Loyalty Points at a faction terminal or from other players, making it less accessible to new or neutral players.
Trivia
- The current Mackerel is modeled by ii_Cove.
